ProjectTitle: PhD position to investigate plant resistance to DNA viruses
InitialFeedbackHistory:
24/05/2024
This is a good dmp with a few minor remarks:
-	Some of your data, such as the gene expression data, will be derived from physical samples. You might consider mentioning them in the data summary.
-	You might consider dry lab and wet lab protocols as documentation rather than research data as the aim of this project is probably not the development of the protocols.
-	The answer on the question “When will the data be made available?” under Sharing is the answer on the question “Where will the data be made available?”
-	You mention CC-BY as the licence you are going to use but this conflicts with “The cost of sharing data will be covered by the requesting parties”.
label: good with suggestions
